name: MPSImageFeatureChannelFormat
desc: Encodes the representation of a single channel within an image.

items.name: case unorm8
items.desc: uint8_t type with value [0,255] and encoding [0,1.0].

items.name: case unorm16
items.desc: uint16_t type with value [0,65535] and encoding [0,1.0].

items.name: case float16
items.desc: IEEE-754 16-bit floating-point type (half precision). Representable normal range is +-[2^-14, 65504], 0, INF, NaN. 11 bits of precision + exponent.

items.name: case float32
items.desc: IEEE-754 32-bit floating-point type (single precision, standard float type in C). 24 bits of precision + exponent.
